content.p: As an active and vibrant part of academic life at the Malaysia Campus, the ECRN has identified the following objectives: It is hoped that the ECRN will greatly benefit the larger research agenda at UNMC through: The ECRN seeks to reflect its ethos in the seminars, papers and workshop content presented by seeking to highlight the social application and broad relevance of the disciplines represented. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: ecrn@nottingham.edu.my
